pkgmetadata.longdescription: Supervised Tensor Decomposition with Side Information // Implement the alternating algorithm for supervised tensor decomposition with interactive side information. Details can be found in the publication Hu, Jiaxin, Chanwoo Lee, and Miaoyan Wang. "Generalized Tensor Decomposition with features on multiple modes." Journal of Computational and Graphical Statistics, Vol. 31, No. 1, 204-218, 2022 doi:10.1080/10618600.2021.1978471.
